learning_objectives.guidance: Measurement of inflation and deflation using the Consumer Prices Index (CPI).
Measurement of inflation and deflation using the Consumer Prices Index (CPI).
Causes of inflation: demand-pull and cost-push. Causes of deflation: demand-side and supply-side.
The consequences of inflation and deflation for consumers, workers, savers, lenders, firms and the economy as a whole.

learning_objectives.guidance: The range of policies available to control inflation and deflation and how effective they might be.
